settings.title: Playhouses
settings.paragraph: Kid-sized play gives your little ones endless entertainment. With a wide range of well-built playhouses perfectly scaled to their world, you’ll spark years of creative fun.

settings.title: GREAT PLAYHOUSE!
settings.paragraph: “Great customer service and great quality. We bought this for our daughter’s third birthday and she LOVES it! It does take a minute to assemble but it had great instructions and had all parts labeled!!”

settings.title: PERFECT PLAYSET!
settings.paragraph: “I purchased this playhouse a couple weeks ago and have nothing but good reviews. Customer service was great, the product delivered quickly and the playhouse itself is the perfect combination of playhouse and play set.”

settings.title: GREAT OUTDOOR STRUCTURE!
settings.paragraph: “We shopped for a play set for our 9 year old and 2 year old for over a year before we made a decision on JUST THE RIGHT ONE. We wanted one that would fit in well with our overall setting on our property and one that would compliment our house and the green wooded area. The kids love the play set and have enjoyed so many fun days and evenings out in the Eagle’s Nest! Talk about an awesome, fun version of a free-standing treehouse with bonus features like the slide, rock climbing wall and deck area! You won’t be disappointed in this play set!”

settings.title: Fun Outdoor & Indoor Playhouses
settings.paragraph:
Part treehouse, part hideout, part anything-they-can-imagine, our playhouses are built for endless entertainment indoors and outdoors. From the moment they’re on the move until they’re ready to step up to a full-size swing set, we’ve got play covered.

  • Options with and without slides
  • Imaginative play features
  • For children of varying abilities
  • Heavy-duty, all-weather materials 
  • Augmented Reality tool to see it in your backyard

settings.title: Tested & Certified
settings.paragraph: Our playhouses surpass industry standards and are certified to exceed ASTM safety standards for playground equipment, with performance testing for children up to 12 years old.

settings.title: Warranty & Assembly
settings.paragraph: The BILT® app provides 3D assembly instructions and you can rely on a 5-year warranty for ongoing support, ensuring years of solid entertainment for your kids.

settings.title: 100% Solid Cedar Wood
settings.paragraph: Cedar is a naturally rot-resistant structure, remains good-looking for years, and doesn’t absorb much heat so it can stay cool to the touch on the hottest days.
